# HUD::SET_BLIP_SHORT_HEIGHT_THRESHOLD

## Summary
Call with TRUE if you want the arrows indicating height difference to only appear on this blip for short differences

## Parameters
* **BLIP_INDEX** blip
* **BOOL** useShortHeightThreshold
